question: You recently visited a local restaurant with your family and hada very good meal.Write a letter to the editor of a local newspaper. In your letter● explain where the restaurant is● describe what you ate in the restaurant● say why you would recommend the restaurant to others
text: I am Karthi and I was located on 8th street, Thudiyalur. I am writing this letter to let know that to share my experience with the restaurant which was recently started and is located in Brookes mall, Townhall.

When celebrating our son's birthday party we reserve a table in the restaurant. First of all, The atmosphere looks delightful and looks very peaceful. The way they invite us was very grateful and everyone in the hotel was so polite and very friendly. Even they came to know about my son's birthday later they give a surprise gift which takes our day even more special. There are so many varieties of cuisines they are offered to choose. Especially, Barbeque was very spicy and tasty. They have a special menu and arrangements for parties and other gatherings also. I suggest you please take this matter to everyone so that folks are really enjoying and spend a memorable time in that beautiful location.
Thanks for your consideration and hope good response from your side.
